items.title: Quickfile Accounting software
items.headline: Learn how to use Quickfile Accounts, an online accounting software to perform several essential bookkeeping tasks
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to complete various common functions using this software including:
Enter the opening balances
Amend the nominal ledger

items.title: Banking And Credit Card Transactions In QuickBooks
items.headline: Learn Every Possible Banking And Credit Card Related Transaction In QuickBooks
objectives_summary: Record any transaction that effects the companies bank account
Record any transaction that effects the companies credit card  account
Use tools like the register window to manage the bank account

items.title: Xero - Mastering Sales in Xero
items.headline: The COMPLETE GUIDE to entering your SALES in XERO - efficiently and accurately.
objectives_summary: How to design your Sales Invoice layout in Xero
How to create your Sales Invoices in Xero
How to copy, amend and delete Sales Invoices in Xero

items.title: Tools and Strategies to Pay Off Student Loan Debt Quickly

visible_instructors.job_title: A college student's guide to paying off student loans
visible_instructors.name: Cameron C
visible_instructors.title: Cameron C Moore

items.headline: Learn how student loan debt works and how to pay it off fast!
objectives_summary: Mathematical and financial concepts of a student loan
Student debt payoff strategies
Excel money management techniques to track your student debt payoff progress

items.title: Distribution and Trade in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance

visible_instructors.title: Brian Clark
visible_instructors.job_title: MS Dynamics CRM Application Consultant & Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Brian

items.headline: Pass the MB6-896  certification on the first attempt. 190 questions
objectives_summary: Candidates who take this exam should have a moderate understanding of distribution and trade processes. They also need an understanding of which Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations functionalities apply to the Procure to Pay and Order to Cash processes.

items.title: Personal Finance Management in Google Sheets (Free Template)
items.headline: Simple, Yet Sophisticated Personal Finance Template and Process for Your Accounts, Bills, Budget, and Credit & Income
objectives_summary: How to self-manage your personal finances with ease in a Google Sheet
Effortlessly gain clarity into how the income you earn is allocated to bills and extracurricular items
Assimilate with how to best use 1Password, Annual Credit Report, and myFICO to stay organized and on-top of your accounts

items.title: Move from Quickbooks Desktop to Quickbooks Online
items.headline: Easy steps to switch and upgrade your bookkeeping software
objectives_summary: They'll be able to take their Quickbooks Desktop data and convert it to use on the platform: Quickbooks Online.

items.title: How to: Financial Management with Mint
items.headline: Using Mint to gain control of your finances.
objectives_summary: How to use Mint to comprehensively track your finances.
How to use Mint's financial data to help make better financial decisions.
What is useful in Mint and what is not.

items.title: QuickBooks Foundamentals

objectives_summary: Set Up a new QuickBooks company
Learn common business terms used by QuickBooks
Opening and saving a QuickBooks file

objectives_summary: Work on Quicken with less Complications.

items.title: Build a Giant Credit: Complete Guide to Credit Repair
items.headline: A guide that teaches credit friendly financial habits and how to drop bad ones in order to boost your personal finance
objectives_summary: : Creating and breaking off habit
Tracking of spending habit
How to track spending habit

items.title: Beginning Budgeting for Debt Free & Storehouse Ready Living
items.headline: The First Steps to Personal Finance Management
objectives_summary: How to take control of your household finances, reduce expenses, and return your income back to you through monthly budgeting.
You will receive the FREE Monthly Budget Tracker Form, a simple one-page form to record your income and expenses and to schedule payment of all your bills.
You will begin to start your Emergency Fund Savings (Storehouse Ready Living) to prepare for life's events, for example, loss of job

objectives_summary: Enter opening balances

items.headline: Reducing the Stress During Tax Season
objectives_summary: Understand QuickBooks Tax Reporting Features.
Understand how to link the chart of accounts to the Schedule C Tax form.
Understand how to setup the fixed asset and items list for tax purposes.

items.title: Mastering QuickBooks 2017 for Lawyers Training Tutorial
items.headline: QuickBooks lessons specifically designed for those who practice law.
objectives_summary: Create a legal company file
Setup and manage trust accounts

items.title: Do Your Own Accounts - using Google Drive
items.headline: Track your Income and Expenditure, prepare a Profit and Loss Account and a Tax Estimate all from a Google Spreadsheet
